whether the tablespace is online or offline." alt="1" required="0"><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.VARA.YES_NO</entry><entry name="text">Online/Offline</entry><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_DB_ONLINEs.00</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">Use these clauses to determine whether the tablespace is online or offline.</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/></properties></dynradiogroup><dynradiogroup enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_DB_EXT_MGMT_CLAUSEs.00" nl="1" quotes="" text="Specify extent management" tooltip="The extent_management_clause lets you specify how the extents of the tablespace will be managed. " alt="1" required="0"><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.AUTOMIC_ORACLE.PRV.VARA.EXT_MGMT_CLAUSE</entry><entry name="text">Specify extent management</entry><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_DB_EXT_MGMT_CLAUSEs.00</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">The extent_management_clause lets you specify how the extents of the tablespace will be managed. </entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/></properties></dynradiogroup><dynradiogroup enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_DB_EXT_MGMT_TYPEs.00" nl="1" quotes="" text="Extent management type" tooltip="Extent management type. Defines which type of extent management clause: LOCAL if you want the tablespace to be locally managed; DICTIONARY if you want the tablespace to be managed using dictionary tables." alt="1" required="0"><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.AUTOMIC_ORACLE.PRV.VARA.EXT_MGMT_TYPE</entry><entry name="text">Extent management type</entry><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_DB_EXT_MGMT_TYPEs.00</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">Extent management type. Defines which type of extent management clause: LOCAL if you want the tablespace to be locally managed; DICTIONARY if you want the tablespace to be managed using dictionary tables.</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/></properties></dynradiogroup><dynradiogroup enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_DB_EXT_MGMT_AUTOALLOCs.00" nl="1" quotes="" text="Managed with "Autoallocate"" tooltip=" AUTOALLOCATE specifies that the tablespace is system managed. Users cannot specify an extent size." alt="1" required="0"><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.VARA.YES_NO</entry><entry name="text">Managed with "Autoallocate"</entry><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_DB_EXT_MGMT_AUTOALLOCs.00</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="tooltip"> AUTOALLOCATE specifies that the tablespace is system managed. Users cannot specify an extent size.</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/></properties></dynradiogroup><dynradiogroup enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_DB_EXT_MGMT_UNIFORMs.00" nl="1" quotes="" text="Managed with "Uniform"" tooltip="UNIFORM specifies that the tablespace is managed with uniform extents of SIZE bytes.The default SIZE is 1 megabyte. All extents of temporary tablespaces are of uniform size, so this keyword is optional for a temporary tablespace. However, you must specify UNIFORM in order to specify SIZE. " alt="1" required="0"><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.VARA.YES_NO</entry><entry name="text">Managed with "Uniform"</entry><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_DB_EXT_MGMT_UNIFORMs.00</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">UNIFORM specifies that the tablespace is managed with uniform extents of SIZE bytes.The default SIZE is 1 megabyte. All extents of temporary tablespaces are of uniform size, so this keyword is optional for a temporary tablespace. However, you must specify UNIFORM in order to specify SIZE. </entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/></properties></dynradiogroup><text enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_DB_EXT_UNFRM_MGMT_SIZEs.00" inputassistance="0" len="" nl="1" regex="" required="0" separator=";" showaspassword="0" text="Extents for uniform management" tooltip="See http://docs.oracle.com/cd/B19306_01/server.102/b14200/clauses008.htm#CHDEIJBC for more details on the syntax of the size specification. Default: empty (clause is not generated)." upper="0" alt="1" multiline="0" multilineIcon="0"><oninputassistant><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptname|@id"/><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptvalue|@value"/><command owner="_promptsetcontainer" owneraction="getData" request="getpromptinputassistance" target="_chainwindow"/></oninputassistant><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">UC_DATATYPE_STRING</entry><entry name="text">Extents for uniform management</entry><entry name="multiselect">0</entry><entry name="separator">;</entry><entry name="len"/><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_DB_EXT_UNFRM_MGMT_SIZEs.00</entry><entry name="inputassistance">0</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="upper">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="showaspassword">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">See http://docs.oracle.com/cd/B19306_01/server.102/b14200/clauses008.htm#CHDEIJBC for more details on the syntax of the size specification. Default: empty (clause is not generated).</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="regex"/><entry name="required">0</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/><entry name="multiline">0</entry><entry name="multilineIcon">0</entry><entry name="onchangereset"/><entry name="resetable">1</entry></properties></text><dynradiogroup enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_DB_SEGM_SPC_AUTOs.00" nl="1" quotes="" text="Free space management" tooltip=" It lets you specify whether Oracle Database should track the used and free space in the segments in the tablespace using free lists or bitmaps. " alt="1" required="0"><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.VARA.YES_NO</entry><entry name="text">Free space management</entry><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_DB_SEGM_SPC_AUTOs.00</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="tooltip"> It lets you specify whether Oracle Database should track the used and free space in the segments in the tablespace using free lists or bitmaps. </entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/></properties></dynradiogroup><dynradiogroup enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_DB_RETENTIONs.00" nl="1" quotes="" text="Retention guarantee" tooltip="specifies that Oracle Database should preserve unexpired undo data in all undo segments of tablespace even if doing so forces the failure of ongoing operations that need undo space in those segments. " alt="1" required="0"><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.VARA.YES_NO</entry><entry name="text">Retention guarantee</entry><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_DB_RETENTIONs.00</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">specifies that Oracle Database should preserve unexpired undo data in all undo segments of tablespace even if doing so forces the failure of ongoing operations that need undo space in those segments. </entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/></properties></dynradiogroup><text enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_DB_TS_GROUP_NAMEs.00" inputassistance="0" len="" nl="1" regex="" required="0" separator=";" showaspassword="0" text="Tablespace group name" tooltip="Use this clause to determine whether tablespace is a member of a tablespace group. A tablespace group lets you assign multiple temporary tablespaces to a single user and increases the addressability of temporary tablespaces." upper="0" alt="1" multiline="0" multilineIcon="0"><oninputassistant><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptname|@id"/><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptvalue|@value"/><command owner="_promptsetcontainer" owneraction="getData" request="getpromptinputassistance" target="_chainwindow"/></oninputassistant><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">UC_DATATYPE_STRING</entry><entry name="text">Tablespace group name</entry><entry name="multiselect">0</entry><entry name="separator">;</entry><entry name="len"/><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_DB_TS_GROUP_NAMEs.00</entry><entry name="inputassistance">0</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="upper">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="showaspassword">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">Use this clause to determine whether tablespace is a member of a tablespace group. A tablespace group lets you assign multiple temporary tablespaces to a single user and increases the addressability of temporary tablespaces.</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="regex"/><entry name="required">0</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/><entry name="multiline">0</entry><entry name="multilineIcon">0</entry><entry name="onchangereset"/><entry name="resetable">1</entry></properties></text><timestamp enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="TIMESTAMP1s.00" max="" min="" nl="1" text="Timestamp" tooltip="" alt="1" strict="1" mode="timestamp"><properties><entry listparam="D" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">UC_DATATYPE_TIMESTAMP</entry><entry name="calendar"/><entry name="key"/><entry name="text">Timestamp</entry><entry alias="min" name="tsmin"/><entry alias="max" name="tsmax"/><entry name="tsoutputformat"/><entry name="id">TIMESTAMP1s.00</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="tooltip"/><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="initvalue">2013-12-02 10:49</entry><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/></properties></timestamp></readpanel></dialog>
